i bought this DVD from TLA for $9.99, and it was not even worth that. It consists of a very few scenes from other DVDs. It is a ripoff perpetrated by the sexy picture on the cover. Justin is not a bottom. I doubt that the other reviewers even watched this DVD.

look at but everytime it looked like you were going to see more it didn't happen so I felt cheated.  would not recommend the time and money for this dvd.  not even good soft porno thats how bad this was

The cover photo should tell you all you need to know about this DVD.  A voyeur's delight--not much is left to the imagination.

They make a half-hearted attempt to insert a connective story line, but I sensed that even they thought it a bit of a joke.  The lead character is very attractive and there is one particularly erotic moment as he prances down a city sidewalk with his shorts falling off.

As I say, if you like the cover photo, you'll enjoy this film.

I thought that this DVD played out like a gorgeous erotic art book. Page by page we have beautiful moving images unfold into each other. He really comes alive (nice voice) when he talks and interacts with the other guys. I only wished there was a bit more story,it would have been perfect. The thing that appealed to me about Justin is the following; Although he is masculine, talks with that deep gravely voice, body language is "butch" and his action reflect 100% self confidence and conviction, there is a 1% feminine about him, when mixed with all the other ingredients it that 1% that gives this statuesque youth the magnetism and appeal one is instantly attracted to.
The title says it all. The model is moderately attractive. The action is adequate. Direction is slow to the point of inertia. As was I whilst watching. Don't bother buying this dvd.
